About_Description_1: MyDoctor.IQ is Iraq's leading healthcare platform, connecting patients with quality healthcare services across the country. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible, transparent, and efficient for all Iraqis.
About_Description_2: Founded in 2023, we've quickly grown to become the most trusted source for finding and booking healthcare services in Iraq. We're committed to improving the healthcare experience for both patients and providers.

Values.title: Patient-Centric Care
Values.description: We put patients first in everything we do, ensuring their needs and experiences are at the heart of our service.

Values.title: Community Impact
Values.description: We're committed to making a positive impact on the health of Iraqi communities through our platform and initiatives.

Values.title: Accessibility
Values.description: We strive to make quality healthcare accessible to all Iraqis, regardless of location or background.

Values.title: Innovation
Values.description: We continuously innovate to improve healthcare delivery and patient experiences in Iraq.

Join_Title: Join Us in Transforming Iraqi Healthcare
Join_Description: We're always looking for passionate individuals and organizations to join us in our mission to improve healthcare in Iraq. Whether you're a healthcare provider, a tech enthusiast, or someone who shares our vision, we'd love to hear from you.
